IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.insert_logout_log') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.insert_logout_log GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.insert_logout_log @account_id dbo.id_t, @last_shard_id INT, @session_seconds INT AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @now SMALLDATETIME SET @now = GETDATE()
INSERT INTO dbo.Logout_Logs (account_id, login_at, logout_at) VALUES (@account_id, DATEADD(second, -@session_seconds, @now), @now)
UPDATE dbo.Accounts SET last_shard_id = @last_shard_id WHERE id = @account_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
